title: Set your realmlist (WoW 3.3.5a)
text:
To connect to this server, set your realmlist:
Windows: edit Data/enUS/realmlist.wtf and set: set realmlist logon.yourserver.com
macOS/Linux (Wine): similarly edit realmlist.wtf
Then start the WoW 3.3.5a client and log in with your account.

title: Addons folder (WoW 3.3.5a)
text:
Install addons by extracting them to: Interface/AddOns.
Example path (Windows): C:/World of Warcraft 3.3.5a/Interface/AddOns
Restart the game and enable addons at the character select screen.

title: Clear Cache to fix launcher or login issues
text: If you have trouble logging in or seeing servers, close the game and delete the Cache folder in your WoW directory. Then relaunch.

title: Useful macros (focus, target, cast)
text:
Example focus macro:
/focus
/cast [@focus,exists] Polymorph

Mouseover cast:
/cast [@mouseover,harm,nodead][] Shadow Bolt

Replace spells to fit your class.

title: Efficient leveling tips (WoW 3.3.5a)
text:
1. Use quest helper addons like QuestHelper or Carbonite for optimal routes
2. Kill mobs while traveling between quest objectives for extra XP
3. Rest at inns or cities to accumulate rested XP (doubles XP gains)
4. Alternate between questing and dungeon runs for bonus experience
5. Follow zone progression by level: don't stay in low-level zones too long

title: Best professions for WoW 3.3.5a
text:
PvE Best: Engineering + Jewelcrafting (utility + stat gems)
PvP Best: Engineering + Jewelcrafting (versatility)
Tanks: Blacksmithing + Jewelcrafting
Gold Making: Mining + Herbalism or Skinning (high demand materials)
Tailoring: Provides Lightweave Embroidery cloak enchant (caster DPS)

title: Keybinding best practices
text:
Keybinding hierarchy:
1. Bind WASD for movement (unbind A/D turning, set to strafe)
2. S-tier: 1-4, Q, E, R, F (rotational abilities)
3. A-tier: 5, T, G, Z, X, C, V (situational abilities)
4. Use Shift/Ctrl modifiers for similar abilities
5. Keep interrupt/defensive abilities easily accessible
6. Bind all combat abilities - no clicking in combat

title: Gear Score requirements and tips
text:
Gear Score benchmarks:
• 3000+ for heroic dungeons
• 3600+ for most pugs
• 4200+ for current tier raids
• 5000+ for hard mode content

Quick GS boost:
• Prioritize epic items over blues
• Focus on weapons, chest, helm, legs (highest multipliers)
• PvP gear for fast epic upgrades
• Auction house BoE epics
• Daily heroic for emblems

title: Mount collection guide (WoW 3.3.5a)
text:
Easy mounts to obtain:
• Bronze Drake - Culling of Stratholme (timed run)
• Armored Brown Bear - Dalaran vendor
• Red Drake - Wyrmrest Accord exalted
• Faction mounts - tabard reputation farming
• AQ40 bug mounts (count toward achievements)
• Netherwing Drakes - egg farming in Outland
• Sons of Hodir - mammoths (long quest chain required)

title: Reputation farming strategies
text:
Main WotLK factions (tabard farming):
• Wyrmrest Accord - Red Drake mount
• Kirin Tor - faction gear discounts
• Argent Crusade - profession patterns
• Knights of the Ebon Blade - faction rewards

Farming method:
1. Get friendly with faction (do quests)
2. Buy faction tabard
3. Run level 80 normal dungeons or any heroics
4. Reputation gains from all mob kills while wearing tabard

title: Fresh level 80 gearing path
text:
Gearing priority for fresh 80:
1. Replace all green/blue quest gear
2. Run normal 80 dungeons for starter epics
3. Daily heroic quest (5 Emblems of Conquest)
4. Normal daily quest (2 Emblems of Valor)
5. Buy 213 ilvl gear with emblems
6. Start Naxx 10/25 for tier gear
7. Save up for 226+ weapons (highest GS impact)

Minimum 3000 GS needed for heroics.
